biotools.summary: PharMD is a tool to retrieve pharmacophore models from MD trajectories of protein-ligand complexes, identification of redundant pharmacophores and virtual screening with multiple pharmacophore models using different scoring schemes.

bioschemas.name: pharmd
bioschemas.summary: PharMD is a tool to retrieve pharmacophore models from MD trajectories of protein-ligand complexes, identification of redundant pharmacophores and virtual screening with multiple pharmacophore models using different scoring schemes.
